All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BBQChicken
This class makes BBQ Pizza.
BuildYourOwn
This class makes Build Your Own Pizza.
BuildYourOwnTest
JUnit test class for the BYO pizza.
ChicagoPizza
Class that makes Chicago pizza with corresponding flavor.
ChicagoStylePizzaController
This class is the controller for ChicagoStylePizzaView.
Crust
This is the Enum class for the crust of the pizza.
CurrentOrderController
This class is the controller for the CurrentOrderView.
Customizable
Interface that has add and remove methods.
Deluxe
This class makes Deluxe Pizza.
MainViewController
This class is the controller for MainView.
Meatzza
This class makes meatzza Pizza.
NewYorkStylePizzaController
This class is the controller for NewYorkStylePizzaView.
NYPizza
Class that makes New York pizza with corresponding flavor.
Order
This class contains the one order for the pizzas.
Pizza
This is the abstract class for the pizza flavors.
PizzaFactory
Interface of the pizza factory that is used in ChicagoPizza and NYPizza.
PizzaStoreMain
Class that starts the program.
Size
Enum class that specifies the size of the pizza.
StoreOrders
Class that stores the orders in the store.
StoreOrdersController
Class that controls StoreOrdersView.
Topping
